#summary Mycila Event

= Introduction =

Mycila Event is a new powerful event framework for in-memory event management. It has a lot of features similar to [https://eventbus.dev.java.net/ EventBus] but is better written and uses Java Concurrency features to provide you with:

= Features =

== In-Memory event system ==

== Asynchronous event dispatching

== Multicasting events ==

== Veto system to control event publishing ==

== Topic Matchers ==

enable a subscriber (and a vetoers) to subscribe to many topics

== Annotation support ==

you can annotate your methods to decouple your code from Mycila Event and subscribe, publish and veto

== Memory management == 

through hard and weak references
